title: Unsold Yeezys collect dust as Adidas lags on a plan to repurpose them
description: Investors have been asking for Adidas' plan to repurpose unsold Yeezy products for months. On Friday, the company said it would likely settle on a plan in the "mid-term."

title: Newton Minow, former FCC chief and public TV advocate, has died at 97
description: Minow, who as Federal Communications Commission chief in the early 1960s famously proclaimed that network television was a "vast wasteland," died on Saturday.

title: Ukraine says its newly fielded U.S. Patriot system downed a Russian hypersonic missile
description: The Russian Kinzhal was intercepted during an air strike over Kyiv earlier this week, a Ukrainian official said. It is the first known time the sophisticated Russian missile has been shot down.

title: Sudan's rival military factions are meeting for in-person talks for the first time
description: Members of the Sudanese army and the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces are meeting in Saudi Arabia in the first in-person talks since the two began vying for control back in April.

title: MTV Movie & TV Awards cancels its live show over writers' strike
description: The network's decision to scale back Sunday's event follows Drew Barrymore's decision to withdraw from hosting duties in solidarity with striking writers, who had planned to picket the ceremony.

title: The fate of a teenage zoo elephant in Pakistan was tragic — and a symbol of much more
description: As details of Noor Jehan's neglect came to light, the revelations sparked a national conversation about the neglect and abuse of animals in Pakistan — and of vulnerable humans as well.

title: A chapter ends for this historic Asian American bookstore, but its story continues
description: For decades, Eastwind Books was an anchor for the Bay Area's Asian American community. Now, the husband and wife duo behind it have decided to close the shop.

title: Ukraine buries a 'brave son' from America
description: Christopher Campbell is one of at least nine Americans known to have died fighting for Ukraine since Russia's invasion began in February 2022.

title: Does sex get better with age? This senior sex therapist thinks so
description: A recent study found that if you expect great sex after midlife, you're more likely to get it. Here's advice for seniors for how to make the most of your love life.

title: Biden and McConnell have a debt limit past. Can they deliver another late-inning save?
description: McConnell may well wish to wash his hands of this year's blood-letting over the debt limit and all it entails. But he knows it will not be that easy. He may know that better than anyone.

title: Watch live: King Charles III and Queen Camilla to be crowned at Westminster Abbey
description: The UK's King Charles III is officially crowned in a ceremony at Westminster Abbey, Saturday, May 6. Watch the coronation live.

title: Texas petrochemical plant fire sends 5 workers to hospital
description: Emergency responders were called to help around 3 p.m. on Friday at the Shell facility in Deer Park, a Houston suburb. A Deer Park official said that there was no shelter-in-place order.
